entry.title: Tyrant Sheriff Deputy EXPOSED! One Of The Most Dangerous! Completely Ignorant Of The Law!

media:group.media:title: Tyrant Sheriff Deputy EXPOSED! One Of The Most Dangerous! Completely Ignorant Of The Law!
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at the Desoto County Administration Building in Mississippi. When I first arrived everything seemed to be going smoothly, but then I ran into one of the most ignorant tyrants I’ve come across yet, Deputy Kizart. You won’t want to miss this one. Please be sure to hit the like button and share! it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________

entry.title: 1st Amendment Auditor Speaks With Officer & Author Matt Thornton About Bridging The Gap | Episode 1

media:group.media:title: 1st Amendment Auditor Speaks With Officer & Author Matt Thornton About Bridging The Gap | Episode 1
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots, this has to be one of my favorite live videos I've ever done on my channel because it is truly a sign that WE are effecting change! For an active duty Police Officer to have the courage to speak openly on camera about issues within Law Enforcement is refreshing to say the least. After you watch this video go check out his videos. I promise that you wont regret it! Links are below! Please be sure to hit the like button, it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it!

entry.title: "Call Security Immediately!" Rude City Employee Freaks Out & Calls Police Over Man With Camera!

media:group.media:title: "Call Security Immediately!" Rude City Employee Freaks Out & Calls Police Over Man With Camera!
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at the City Hall in Atlanta, Georgia when I was confronted by an unpleasant woman from the executive’s office who called law enforcement. Thankfully when the Police arrived they didn’t escalate the situation and didn’t violate our rights…but the public servants working inside city hall need a big attitude adjustment. Please be sure to hit the like button and share! it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________

entry.title: Correctional Officer CAUGHT On Camera Making Racist Comments to Journalist in Front Of Commander!

media:group.media:title: Correctional Officer CAUGHT On Camera Making Racist Comments to Journalist in Front Of Commander!
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at the Marshall County Correctional Facility In the State of Mississippi. While there I was confronted by a Correctional Officer who told me to “Go Back to My Country” A short time after Law Enforcement arrived and tried to curtail my Free Speech but I wouldn’t let them! I will hold that Correctional Officer accountable for her Racist Comments! At the very least she would lose her position as a public servant. Please be sure to hit the like button and share! it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________

entry.title: Probation Department Chief & Officers Have An Issue With Journalist Exercising His Rights! Educated!

media:group.media:title: Probation Department Chief & Officers Have An Issue With Journalist Exercising His Rights! Educated!
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at the Dekalb County Court House in Decatur, Georgia. At first, everything was going well, until I reached the Probation Department. I was confronted by Probation Officers & eventually the Chief who were all not only ignorant on our 1st Amendment Rights, but spoke to me as if I was on Probation. When they realized I wasn’t going to back down they changed their tune and didn’t interfere…then I got to the District Attorneys Office…Please be sure to hit the like button and share! it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________
If you feel the need to peacefully petition your grievances against your government or commend any public servants behavior regarding this incident I will leave public contact information below. Always remember, this is your right under the 1st Amendment to the U.S Constitution

entry.title: Filing Internal Affairs Complaint Against Tyrant Officers! Unlawful Arrest, Excessive Force & Lying!

media:group.media:title: Filing Internal Affairs Complaint Against Tyrant Officers! Unlawful Arrest, Excessive Force & Lying!
media:group.media:description:
Link to Original Unlawful Arrest Video:
https://youtu.be/gwokjLaGCmU
We the People need to peacefully unite! Tyranny, has no place in our country! We demand accountability and change! All public contact information is below.
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, on June 14th 2022, I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at the United States Post Office Located In Hagerstown, Maryland. I was I’m almost immediately confronted by Postal Employees who were ignorant of their own rules and regulations. Hagerstown Police were called and when they arrived they immediately attempted to violate my constitutional rights. Officers Deavers & Crause lies serval times in person and on the police report, stating that the postal employees ordered me to leave. This never happened, which the video clearly shows. My camera was ripped out of my hand by Ofc Crause and they place handcuffs on me so tight it cut my circulation and then hotboxed me in their cruiser. Despicable, Tyranical behavior. This department didn’t even have jurisdiction. We the People will hold them accountable! I do not have a court date yet but I will let you all know when I know. Please be sure to hit the like button and share! it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________
If you feel the need to peacefully petition your grievances against your government or commend any public servants behavior regarding this incident I will leave public contact information below. Always remember, this is your right under the 1st Amendment to the U.S Constitution!
Hagerstown Police Department:
+1 (301) 790-3700
https://www.facebook.com/hagerstownpd
Chief of Police: Paul "Joey" Kifer
pkifer@Hagerstownpd.org
Mayor Emily Keller
ekeller@hagerstownmd.org
Washington County States Attorney:
Gina Cirincion
240-313-2000
sao@washco-md.net
Herald Mail Media (Hagerstown Local News)
1-888-896-3820
News Director: Joseph Deinlein
jdeinlein@herald-mail.com
Hagerstown Post Office
3017978100

entry.title: Health Care Manager Ignorant of HIPAA Laws & 1st Amendment! Calls Police - Gets a Free Education!

media:group.media:title: Health Care Manager Ignorant of HIPAA Laws & 1st Amendment! Calls Police - Gets a Free Education!
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at St. Clair County Health Department in Pell City, Alabama. Almost as soon as I entered I was confronted by the Office Manager who said I was in violation of HIPAA Laws…I tried my best to educate her not only on HIPAA but our constitutional rights, she decided to call Pell City Police to have me removed but end the way she thought…Please be sure to hit the like button, it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________

entry.title: Tyrant G.B.I Agents Try to Make Up Fake Laws to Intimidate Journalist! Get Owned & Sent Packing!

media:group.media:title: Tyrant G.B.I Agents Try to Make Up Fake Laws to Intimidate Journalist! Get Owned & Sent Packing!
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, On June 2nd 2022 I was peacefully exercising my 1st Amendment Rights at the Law Enforcement Center located in Rome, Georgia. While recording some tax payer funded Police Vehicles in the Public Parking Garage I was confronted by three Georgia Bureau Of Investigation Agents. All three of them refused to identify themselves when asked and not only did they escalate the situation & acted unprofessional they had a grave misunderstanding of the GA Stop & ID statute. The next day I went to the GBI headquarters to try and hold them accountable…Please be sure to hit the like button, it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________

entry.title: Uvalde Massacre | Greatest Failure In Modern American Law Enforcement History, Lets Talk About it

media:group.media:title: Uvalde Massacre | Greatest Failure In Modern American Law Enforcement History, Lets Talk About it
media:group.media:description:
Fellow Patriots & Freedom lovers, As you know, On Tuesday May 24th 2022, 19 Children & 2 Teachers at the Uvalde, Texas Elementary School, were massacred by a man that cannot be described in any other way other than pure evil. With new details coming to light, we are finding out that it took over an hour for law enforcement to breach the classroom and take out the shooter. Why is that? There’s more questions than answers but I felt it necessary to use my platform to discuss it. Please be sure to hit the like button, it truly helps spread this around for more Patriots to see it and I appreciate it! __________________________________________________________________
